sect1.title: Packet Loss
sect1.para: Packet loss occurs when one or more packets of data traveling across a network fail to reach their destination. Packet loss have maybe the greatest impact on the quality of a Scenic session. when a packet is lost, this mean that the receptor will not have this data. The effect is easily perceptible.
Effect of packet loss on audio signal. Noise in the sound: Metallic sound effect, tics and pops. Loss of part of the audio signal, like when loosing your signal using a cell phone.
Effect of packet loss on video signal Drop Frame. Pixel
